Key Match Events: Josh Hart recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 15 rebounds, and 10 assists
Karl-Anthony Towns scored 32 points and had 13 rebounds
Jonas Valanciunas equaled his season high with 22 points for Washington
Miscellaneous Highlights: There was a scary moment with 3:07 to play in the third quarter when Washington rookie guard Bub Carrington fell backward while guarding a player and hit a Knicks player’s knee and then the back of his head on the court. Carrington left in a wheelchair, covering his face and did not return with a post-traumatic headache.
Others: The Wizards played their second straight game without leading scorer Jordan Poole, who’s out with a bruised left hip. Kyle Kuzma returned after missing 12 games with a strained left rib.
